statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.headline: Centenary 82, Texas State 81 (OT)
article.story: SAN MARCOS, Texas (AP) -- Chase Adams hit a jumper with 33 seconds remaining in overtime to give Centenary an 82-81 win against Texas State on Saturday night. The Bobcats (5-8) held on for a final shot but Antwon Williams turned the ball over with 3 seconds remaining, sealing the win for Centenary (6-8). Texas State closed a 10-point gap in the final two minutes of regulation, and Dylan Moseley and Antwoine Blanchard hit two key 3-pointers. Brandon Bush made two free throws to tie the game at 75 with 2.4 seconds left to send the game to overtime. Larry Logan led the Gents with 21 points and six rebounds. Tyrone Hamilton added 14 points and Bryan Baumann had 13, including three 3-pointers. Blanchard scored 16 points for the Bobcats, including four 3-pointers. Matt Fullenwider and Williams added 12 points apiece.
